newsitem.title: USA: Eckerd, ProxyMed in pharmacy network deal.
newsitem.headline: Eckerd, ProxyMed in pharmacy network deal.

text.p: J.C. Penney Co Inc unit Eckerd Corp and ProxyMed Inc said Tuesday they had signed a network service agreement to provide electronic prescription services.

The services will be provided by ProxyNet and the Pre-Scribe network recently acquired by ProxyMed, the companies said. Eckerd will pay a per-transaction fee for each prescription transmitted to its pharmacies.
"Eckerd is excited about the ability to continue as a Pre-Scribe customer, and to have this service uninterrupted," said operations vice president Richard Dale Adkins.
